appName.description: The name of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDescription.message: Share easily, from a sheet of paper, to original website. Add a qrcode to pages, you can choose its position and color.
appDescription.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

installMessage.message: QRCodes need that you reload tabs before you can display qrcode.
installMessage.description: Alert displayed on instalaltion: user must reload tabs.

displayQrcodeLabel.description: Label of button to display qrcode.

tooLongURL.message: Cannot create qrcode, adresse is too long.
tooLongURL.description: Displayed as error when url is too long to being encoded in qrcode.

optionSizeTooSmallAlert.description: Warning displayed when user choose a small size.

optionColorDefaultValue.description: Value for automatic color (should not be a valid hexadecimal color).

optionColorTooLightAlert.description: Error displayed when user choose a light color.

optionPageFooterLabel.description: Label for page footer option: should qrcode be on the first page ?

optionVerticalPositionTopValue.description: Value for top position in options page.

optionVerticalPositionBottomValue.description: Value for bottom position in options page.

optionHorizontalPositionLeftValue.description: Value for left position in options page.

optionHorizontalPositionRightValue.description: Value for right position in options page.

confirmReset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings ?

resetButton.description: Text of the reset button in options page.

saveButton.description: Text of the save button in options page.
